GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v5.10.156
GSD.description:
net: use struct_group to copy ip/ipv6 header addresses

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.156 by commit 6e9334436d78d1cf12919807e4124032f02650d6, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit c3f8324188fa80178f20c8209b492ca6191177e8. For more details please see the references link.
